short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple, efficient tool that searches and captures targeted Upwork jobs based on your preferences every minute.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Upwork Job Tracker: Your Personal Job Search Assistant

๐ Never miss out on the perfect Upwork opportunity again! Upwork Job Tracker is a versatile extension designed to simplify your job search process on Upwork, enabling freelancers to find and apply to relevant jobs faster and more efficiently.
===========
Available Plans:
๐ Free Mode Features:
- Basic job tracking with up to 4 keywords/tags
- Job notifications every 5 minutes (fixed interval)
- Basic notification sound
- Essential job management tools

โญ Premium Mode Features:
- Unlimited keywords/tags for precise job matching
- Customizable check intervals (1-60 minutes)
- Cover letter template with quick-copy functionality
- Toggle between "Match Jobs" and "All Jobs" modes
- Customizable notification sounds
- Advanced job management tools
- All features from Free mode included
===========
๐ Your Privacy and Security Matter:

๐ก We prioritize your privacy and security. Here are the key points:
- Limited Access: Our extension interacts only with Upworkโs general job search page (https://www.upwork.com/nx/search).
- Transparent Permissions: Permissions are strictly for reading data from (http://www.upwork.com) to detect new job postings.
- No Data Collection: We do not collect, store, or transmit any personal information.
- No Account Required: Use this extension with or without an Upwork account.
- Regular Updates: We ensure compatibility with the latest security standards.
- Enhanced Safe Browsing: While our extension may display a "not trusted" message for new extensions, weโre actively building our reputation with Google.
===========
Key Features:
- Customizable Job Filtering: Enter specific keywords to focus on relevant opportunities (4 tags in Free mode, unlimited in Premium).
- Real-time Job Alerts: Receive instant notifications for jobs matching your criteria.
- Automatic Searches: Regular scans of Upwork (every 5 minutes in Free mode, customizable in Premium).
- User-friendly Job Management: Organized display of matched jobs for easy review.
- Smart Notification System: Visual badge notifications and audio alerts.
- Cover Letter Template (Premium): Save and quick-copy templates for faster applications.
- Mute/Unmute Notifications: Control when you receive alerts.
- Flexible Job Matching (Premium): Switch between "Match Jobs" and "All Jobs" modes for broader or focused searches.
===========
Why Install Upwork Job Tracker?
- ๐ Save Time: Eliminate the need for constant manual refreshing.
- ๐ Increase Your Chances: Be among the first to apply for new jobs.
- ๐ Stay Organized: Effectively manage and prioritize job opportunities.
- ๐ Tailored to Your Needs: Flexible filters show only relevant jobs.
- ๐ Boost Your Freelance Career: Access quality job postings faster.
- ๐ Control Your Workflow: Customize your job search experience with Premium features.
===========
๐ผ Start with our Free mode to experience the essential features, then upgrade to Premium to unlock the full potential of Upwork Job Tracker. Transform your job search experience today!
===========================
